comments.author: davidp99@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: We're refactoring this actor to use IPDL refcounting, as part of accessing the effort involved in migrating all IPDL actors to use IPDL refcounting. The goal is to reduce and stabilize the surface area of IPDL while providing greater stability and giving clients more actionable errors.
